body.p: Suppose you want to localize your publishing for the Dutch language (language code nl). To do this, use the following procedure:

ol.li:
Copy and paste the contents of the following files into your customization CSS:
[PLUGIN_DIR]/css/core/-i18n-de.css
[PLUGIN_DIR]/css/print/p-i18n-de.css

In an editor, open the English localization files, side by side with your customization CSS:
[PLUGIN_DIR]/css/core/-i18n-en.css
[PLUGIN_DIR]css/print/p-i18n-en.css
Translate each of the strings from your customization CSS, using the English localization as a reference.
